turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The address is 11895 W Broad St., Henrico, VA

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caffe Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like, Short, Tall, Venti, or Grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like, almond, cocunut, nonfat, whole, 2%, or soy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like cream and sugar in the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes but I prefer to do it myself, so just put the cream that the recipe asks for.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like an extra 75 mg shot of caffeine?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all for your order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like this order for pick-up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When would you like the pick-up time to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok your confirmation message will be send to the provided phone number. You will have a Tall Cafe Americano (2% milk) with an extra shot of caffine available for pick up in 15 minutes. Thank you!
